get.summary: Find the todos in the CRM system, using the given, optional CEQL search expression. The search expression maps to the OData $filter clause. For example, to search for all todos that have been marked priority, the search expression parameter will be mapped from where: isPriority=‘true’ to $filter: isPriority eq true. If a search expression is not provided, then the first 150 records will be returned. Only returns details about your account.

401.description: Unauthorized - An invalid element token, user secret and/or org secret provided

403.description: Forbidden - Access to the resource by the provider is forbidden

404.description: Not found - The requested resource is not found

405.description: Method not allowed - Incorrect HTTP verb used, e.g., GET used when POST expected

406.description: Not acceptable - The response content type does not match the "Accept" header value

409.description: Conflict - If a resource being created already exists

415.description: Unsupported media type - The server cannot handle the requested Content-Type

500.description: Server error - Something went wrong on the Cloud Elements server

502.description: Provider server error - Something went wrong on the Provider or Endpoint's server

instanceId.description: Instance Id of the bulk job

description.x-samplevalue: The authorization tokens. The format for the header value is 'Element <token>, User <user secret>'

dataUri.description: The string representation of the Contacts in CSV format.

summary.x-samplevalue: Create a new contact in the CRM service. Contact creation will flow through Cloud Elements to your CRM service. With the exception of the 'id' field, the required fields indicated in the 'Contact' model are those required to create a new contact.
